const handleSquareClick=colour=>{console.log(`${colour} square clicked!`);};const getPattern=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get('/api/memorycolourmaster/getpattern');// Update the state with the response message

console.error("Error fetching the greeting: ",error);}};//POST
